definition: deficient/to let sb down/to cause sb suffering
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: If he hath wronged thee, or oweth thee ought, put that on mine account;
sentences.chinese: 他若虧負你，或欠你什麼，都歸在我的帳上。

sentences.english: But he answered one of them, `Friend, I am not being unfair to you.
sentences.chinese: 家主回答其中的一人說，朋友，我不虧負你。

sentences.english: I robbed other churches, taking wages of them, to do you service.
sentences.chinese: 我虧負了別的教會，向他們取了工價來，給你們效力。
